q1: Who do you think is Brazil's best player?
a1: Neymar Jr is their best player by far.
q2: How many World Cups has Brazil won?
a2: Brazil has won the World Cup 5 times. 2002, 1994, 1970, 1962, 1958.
q3: When do you think they will win again?
q4: When is the next time they play?
a4: I wish they were playing today.
q5: Since the World Cup just ended, they will probably take a break. Many clubs are also just now starting their seasons
a5: I think they are preparing for the next cup
